name: Balloon Popping Simulator 2022
description:
Welcome to Balloon Popping Simulator 2022! This is a simple high-score based game where you try and pop the most balloons in 30 seconds. Hold right click to aim, and let go to fire!

If you are getting fragment shader errors, please make sure your graphic drivers are up to date.

Gameplay Overview

Technical Showcase

Note: The videos have inconsistent framerate because of playing and recording at the same time. 

Start the round by shooting the lone balloon in the field. After the round is complete, view the console for statistics.

There are 3 difficulties that you can choose from by pressing 1-3 in between rounds. For full list of controls, please read the README text file.

The installer and zip file contains the same files.

If you would like to view the source code, the GitHub repo can be found here!
